Text: Blyth Power Station:  Blyth A Power Station was built and opened first but had a smaller generating capacity than its sister station, Blyth B Power Station, which was built to its west four years later.
Triplets:<Blyth A Power Station
4:
--------------------
<Text: Blyth Power Station:  The power stations' four large chimneys were a landmark of the Northumberland skyline for over 40 years; the A Station's two chimneys each stood at 140 m ; the B Station's two chimneys were taller, at 170 m each.>
